dcterms:creator: G. Hinton
P. Dayan
B. Frey
R. Neal
dcterms:description: The MNIST database for handwritten numbers is used to train networks and test the effectiveness of the Contrastive Divergence CD1 algorithm in reconstructing images from noisy inputs.
dcterms:title: MNIST database for handwritten numbers

dcterms:creator: G. E. Hinton
T. J. Sejnowski
D. E. Rumelhart
J. L. McClelland
dcterms:description: The MNIST database for handwritten numbers is referenced in the context of learning and relearning in Boltzmann Machines.
dcterms:title: MNIST database for handwritten numbers

dcterms:creator: V. Chinarov
M. Menzinger
dcterms:description: The MNIST database for handwritten numbers is utilized to demonstrate the capabilities of Bistable Gradient Networks in storing and reconstructing patterns.
dcterms:title: MNIST database for handwritten numbers
